fundamentals.name: Path of Foundations
fundamentals.description: Discover the patterns that form the foundation of Sudoku.
fundamentals.completionMessage: You have mastered the fundamentals. The deeper patterns of Sudoku await your discovery.

insight.name: Path of Insight
insight.description: Deepen your understanding of the relationships between numbers.
insight.completionMessage: Your insights have deepened. Now begins the journey to true mastery.

mastery.name: Path of Mastery
mastery.description: Refine your techniques and develop your own intuition.
mastery.completionMessage: You now command the art of Sudoku. The way to wisdom lies before you.

wisdom.name: Path of Wisdom
wisdom.description: Recognize the deeper connections and reach a new level of understanding.
wisdom.completionMessage: Your wisdom shines bright. The path of transcendence awaits you.

transcendence.name: Path of Transcendence
transcendence.description: Experience the flow of the game, where intuition and logic become one.
transcendence.completionMessage: You have reached the highest plane. The puzzle and you have become one.

0.name: Curious Mind
0.message: Every journey begins with curiosity and openness.

1.name: Pattern Seeker
1.message: Recognize how numbers reveal their secrets through patterns.

2.name: Attentive Student
2.message: Your attention to detail grows with each puzzle.

3.name: Patient Observer
3.message: In stillness and patience lies the key to the puzzle.

4.name: Foundation Finder
4.message: You now clearly see the foundation upon which every Sudoku is built.

5.name: Clarity Seeker
5.message: With each solved puzzle, your vision becomes clearer.

6.name: Possibility Weigher
6.message: You learn to see and weigh the many possibilities.

7.name: Connection Recognizer
7.message: The connections between numbers reveal themselves to your mind.

8.name: Pattern Weaver
8.message: You connect patterns into a greater whole.

9.name: Insightful Thinker
9.message: Your insights merge into a deeper understanding.

10.name: Skillful Practitioner
10.message: Techniques and strategies become your tools.

11.name: Precise Practitioner
11.message: Your approach becomes ever more precise and efficient.

12.name: Flowing Solver
12.message: Your solutions flow more smoothly and naturally.

13.name: Intuitive Thinker
13.message: Intuition begins to complement your logic.

14.name: Balanced Master
14.message: Logic and intuition are now in balance within your mind.

15.name: Quiet Observer
15.message: In the stillness of mind, you see the solution most clearly.

16.name: Profound Delver
16.message: Your understanding now reaches into the depths of the puzzle.

17.name: Serene Thinker
17.message: Complexity loses its terror in your serenity.

18.name: Wise Beholder
18.message: You see beyond the puzzle and recognize its harmony.

19.name: Philosophical Mind
19.message: Sudoku becomes a mirror of your clearest thinking.

20.name: Flowing Spirit
20.message: You no longer solve puzzles - you dance with them.

21.name: Boundless Thinker
21.message: The boundaries between puzzle and solution blur.

22.name: Harmony Shaper
22.message: You create harmony where once there was only chaos.

23.name: Enlightened Player
23.message: The puzzle is no longer outside, but part of you.

24.name: Zen Master
24.message: Puzzle and solver are no longer separate.

25.name: Astral Wanderer
25.message: Your soul now roams distant spheres.

26.name: Starweaver
26.message: You weave nets from light and numbers.

28.name: Nexus Forger
28.message: You forge paths between space and time.

29.name: Infinity Pilgrim
29.message: No end can hold you back.

32.name: Aurora Guardian
32.message: You kindle northern lights in the sea of numbers.

33.name: Phenomenon Discoverer
33.message: Every puzzle holds a new wonder.

34.name: Empyrean Messenger
34.message: You carry messages from the highest light.

35.name: Paradigm Creator
35.message: You set new standards in the cosmos of logic.

36.name: Elysium Dreamer
36.message: You transform puzzles into harmonious visions.

37.name: Singularity Traveler
37.message: You transcend every threshold of understanding.

38.name: Eternity Thinker
38.message: Your mind expands across time and space.

39.name: Illumination Bringer
39.message: You illuminate paths that were hidden before.

40.name: New Beginning Shaper
40.message: From every ending grows a new beginning.

41.name: Metatron Scout
41.message: You explore the sacred architectures of the game.

42.name: Oracle Weaver
42.message: You weave prophecies from number patterns.

44.name: Hyperion Warden
44.message: You protect the flame of knowledge.

46.name: Transcendence Whisperer
46.message: You hear the voice of the universe.

47.name: Aether Wanderer II
47.message: Your path leads you deeper into the unknown.

48.name: Sphere Master
48.message: You reign over sound and silence in the puzzle.

49.name: Cosmocrator
49.message: You rule in the realm of infinite possibilities.

50.name: Dimensional Pioneer
50.message: You blaze new trails through space and number.

51.name: Star Chronicler
51.message: You draw stories in the numerical sky.

52.name: Galactic Scribe
52.message: You write your legacy into the vastness.

53.name: Aurora Lighter
53.message: You ignite polar lights of wisdom.

54.name: Eternal Spark
54.message: A spark of your clarity illuminates all.

56.name: Quantum Singer
56.message: You sing songs from numbers and light.

58.name: Mythical Navigator
58.message: You find paths in legendary spheres.

59.name: Empyreal Dreamer
59.message: You dream the structures of the infinite.

60.name: Time Traveler
60.message: Your steps set ripples through time.

61.name: Cosmic Dancer
61.message: You move in the dance of puzzles.

62.name: Light Weaver
62.message: You weave nets from rays and numbers.

63.name: Ethereal Herald
63.message: You deliver messages from higher worlds.

65.name: Soul Archaeologist
65.message: You dig for the origins of logic.

67.name: Dimension Weaver
67.message: You tie bridges between all worlds.

68.name: Transcendence Orchestra
68.message: You conduct symphonies in the universe of numbers.

69.name: Universal Poet
69.message: You compose verses from formulas and stars.

70.name: Aeon Chronicler
70.message: You immortalize time in every solved puzzle.

71.name: Eternity Narrator
71.message: You tell stories that know no end.

72.name: Cosmic Zen Master
72.message: Within you, all is still yet complete.

milestones.5: You have entered the Path of Insight. Your understanding deepens with each puzzle.
milestones.10: The Path of Mastery welcomes you. Your practice begins to transform into intuition.
milestones.15: On the Path of Wisdom, you now recognize the deeper connections of Sudoku.
milestones.20: The Path of Transcendence now lies before you. The highest level of Sudoku art is within reach.
